Articles.Content: Could someone make a simple calculator for in game ksp? Like translating m/s to nautical mph, imperial units, mach or something like that, that I have no idea how to word?

There's a mod that does just that ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[Speed Unit Changer](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75308)

Although it looks outdated (last updated to KSP v0.24.2), folks claim its working on KSP v1.0.2
